context.p: You can download and lock a document:

step.cmd: Click the Dashboard tool in the toolbar.
Select the folder you want to download from.
Select the document you want to download and lock.
Click the ellipsis button at the top of the content pane.

taskbody.result:
The file is saved to your download folder and is displayed as locked in the content pane.
Example: .
The file can not be edited or moved by other project members.
